tit.e: Imperial Prince Tokiwai no miya Matahito
Imperial Prince Tokiwai no miya Matahito

sen.j: 常盤井宮全仁親王（ときわいのみやまたひとしんのう、元亨元年（1321年） - 貞治6年/正平 22年7月19日 （1367年8月15日））は、室町時代初頭の皇族。
sen.e: Imperial Prince Tokiwai no miya Matahito (1321 ~ August 15th, 1367) is a member of the Imperial family of the early Muromachi Period.
Imperial Prince Tokiwai no miya Matahito (1321 ~ August 15th, 1367) was a member of the Imperial family during the early Muromachi Period.
Imperial Prince Tokiwain miya Matahito (1321 - August 23, 1367) was a member of the Imperial family during the early Muromachi Period.
sen.cmt: スペース削除~を-に訂正しました。th削除"August 15, 1367"→"August 23, 1367"に変更しました。

sen.e: He is the 2nd head of the house of Imperial Prince Tokiwai.
He is the 2nd head of the household of Imperial Prince Tokiwai.
He is the 2nd head of the household of Imperial Prince Tokiwai.
His rank is Sanbon (the third rank of the Imperial Prince's ranks.)
His rank is Sanbon (the third rank for an Imperial Prince.)
His rank is Sanbon (the third rank for an Imperial Prince.)

sen.j: 大宰帥、中務卿に任じられる。
sen.e: He was designated as Dazai no sochi (Governor-General of the Dazai-fu offices) and Nakatsukasa-kyo (Minister of the Ministry of Central Affairs.)
He was designated as Dazai no sochi (Governor-General of the Dazai-fu offices) and Nakatsukasa-kyo (Minister of the Ministry of Central Affairs.)
He was designated as Dazai no sochi (Governor-General of the Dazai-fu offices) and Nakatsukasa-kyo (Minister of the Ministry of Central Affairs.)

sen.j: 恒明親王が19歳の時の子で、暦応4年（1341年）、11歳の時に元服する。
sen.e: He was born as a son of Imperial Prince Tsuneaki [Tsuneakira] when he was 19, and celebrated genpuku (celebrate his coming of age) when he was 11 years old.
He was born the son of Imperial Prince Tsuneaki [Tsuneakira] when the prince was 19, and celebrated genpuku (coming of age) when he was 11 years old.
He was born the son of Imperial Prince Tsuneaki (also known as Tsuneakira) when the prince was 19, and celebrated genpuku (coming of age) when he was 11 years old.

sen.j: この時既に親王宣下を受けていたらしく、『砂巖』には「全仁親王」と書かれている。
sen.e: It seems he was already given the title of Imperial Prince at this time that he was described as "Imperial Prince Matahito" in a historical book "Sagan"(sandstone)."
It seems he was already given the title of Imperial Prince by the time he was described as "Imperial Prince Matahito" in the historical book "Sagan"(sandstone)."
It seems he was already given the title of Imperial Prince by the time he was described as 'Imperial Prince Matahito' in the historical book "Sagan"(sandstone)."

sen.j: 貞治6年（1367年）6月、病気により出家、翌月薨去した（『愚管記』、『師守記』）。
sen.e: In June 1367, he became a priest due to illness and the next month, he died ("Gukan-ki" (Diary of Michitsugu KONOE) and "Moromori-ki" (Diary of Moromori NAKAHARA.))
In June 1367, he became a priest due to illness and the following month, he died ("Gukan-ki"- Diary of Michitsugu KONOE and "Moromori-ki"- Diary of Moromori NAKAHARA.)
In July (June in old lunar calendar) 1367, he became a priest due to illness and the following month, he died ("Gukan-ki"- Diary of Michitsugu KONOE and "Moromori-ki"- Diary of Moromori NAKAHARA.)
sen.cmt: "June"→"July (June in old lunar calendar)"に変更しました。
